title: Brian 'Free Speech' Rose Censors Teenagers
description:
With only a few days left until the Mayoral election, Brian Rose is still trying to avoid answering questions about what happened to the money from his "Digital Freedom Platform" scam.

The mainstream media have done a poor job at holding Rose to account and asking the questions so many want answered, but the teenage hosts of a small podcast, Politics Relaxed, did their homework and put Rose on the spot. He quit the interview halfway through and is now using a bogus copyright claim to block them putting the film up until after the election.

Politics Relaxed: https://politicsrelaxed.wixsite.com/website

Full press release from Politics Relaxed: https://politicsrelaxed.wixsite.com/website/post/freedom-of-speech-london-mayoral-candidate-brian-rose-censors-teenagers

Rebel Wisdom has a public event with Nic Gabriel (former co-host of London Real) on Tuesday 4th May, register here: https://us02web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZEtdumvpzgsGNafwa99NfEy-cPwiQ2YHScO
